...why didn't we share our lives?
You shouldn't have to tell me everything, Derek.
translation.ko: 내게 모든 걸 말할 필요는 없어, 데릭

translation.en: But why wouldn't you want to?
Unless there's somebody else you're waiting for.
translation.ko: 자기가 기다리는 사람이 따로 있는 게 아니라면 말이야

translation.en: Someone who isn't afraid to say, "The past isn't past, Derek."
translation.ko: 과거는 과거가 아니라고 솔직히 말할 수 있는 사람

translation.en: Or, "I really wanna meet your folks."
Or, "I really, really hate hockey."
-You do? -Oh, to the bottom of the ninth.
-That's baseball. -You see that?
I was just too afraid to be honest with you, with myself, because....
If I was really honest...
...gut-wrenching honest...
...then I'd have to admit...
...that we weren't right the way you guys are.
translation.ko: 우리가 자기와 조이스 같은 관계는 못 된다는 걸

translation.en: Were we?
There's your show, Kippie.
"My Boyfriend Belongs With His Ex...
...and I Just Figured It Out."
Sue me, Carl.
Listen.
I'm fully aware that you may never speak to me again.
translation.ko: 아마 두 번 다시 나와 말 안 섞겠지

translation.en: And I understand. I do.
But before you leave, I want you to know that this whole idea...
translation.ko: 하지만 떠나기 전에 이거 하난 말해주고 싶어

translation.en: ...wasn't planned out. It wasn't premeditated.
translation.ko: 이 모든 게 처음부터 계획된 건 아니었어

translation.en: It presented itself, and then I guided it into this...
translation.ko: 자연스럽게 벌어진 일에 내가 살짝 손을 대서

translation.en: ...event. Now, granted, it was dramatic. It was extreme...
translation.ko: 쇼로 만든 거야 정말 극적이고 강렬했지

translation.en: ...but you dove head-on into the muck and came out...
...with this masterpiece.
And I hope one day you can understand...
translation.ko: 언젠가 너도 깨닫는 날이 오길 바라

translation.en: ...that you got what you wanted, Stace:
Your life back.
I should tear your eyes out right now.
But how will you ever be able to look at yourself in the morning?
translation.ko: 그럼 내일 아침에 당신 꼴을 못 볼 테니까

translation.en: Looks like we have an audience.
Stay put. Kippie Kann Live and "Little Black Book"...
translation.ko: 채널 고정하세요 키피 캔의 '리틀 블랙 북'이

translation.en: ...will be back after these words.
Move it, will you?
The question: How does a girl who jumps into a rabbit hole...
translation.ko: 질문, 소녀가 작정하고 토끼 굴로 내려가

translation.en: ...plummeting into chaos, come out unchanged?
translation.ko: 혼란스러운 세계에 빠졌는데 어떻게 변하지 않고 나왔을까?

translation.en: The answer:
She doesn't.
No, it can't be closed now.
Stacy?
Stacy Holt. It's Bean.
-King. Bean King from college. -Bean.
translation.ko: - 대학 때 만났던 빈 킹 - 빈

translation.en: Bean, what are you doing here?
Inventory. We just finished.
Bean There's yours? The coffee place?
I come here all the time. Of course it's yours.
Wow, this all makes sense in some cosmic way.
translation.ko: 신기하게도 이제야 모든 게 이해되는 것 같아

translation.en: I get it. I get it.
This must sound crazy to you.
It's just--
I have spent a lifetime preparing for a lifetime.
translation.ko: 난 인생을 준비하는 데 내 인생을 다 써왔어

translation.en: And I was beginning to think it all went wrong somehow.
translation.ko: 모든 게 잘못됐다는 생각이 들기 시작했었는데

translation.en: But maybe you're the reason, Bean.
-For? -Everything.
Maybe you're the plan I was supposed to hang on to.
translation.ko: 내가 붙잡아야 할 계획이 바로 너일지도 몰라

translation.en: Bean?
The 8:00 was sold out. Should I try the 10:20?
Yeah, sure, honey. I'll be right there.
That's my wife, Colleen.
You should come meet her.
Love to, but I just gotta go jump in the river now.
translation.ko: 그러고 싶지만 지금은 강에 뛰어내려야 해서

translation.en: Hey, come on, now.
Every plan I had for my life went so unbelievably wrong.
translation.ko: 인생을 위해 세웠던 계획들이 하나같이 전부 다 잘못됐어

translation.en: John Lennon said, "Life happens when you're busy making other plans."
translation.ko: 존 레논이 그러는데 인생은 계획을 세우는 사이에 벌어진대

translation.en: -Then he got shot. -Right.
You just gotta live. Stop planning your moves.
Let them happen. I mean, you might be surprised.
translation.ko: 흘러가는 대로 둬 아마 깜짝 놀랄걸?

translation.en: Do you believe in happy endings, Bean?
Yeah, I think so.
How about you?
I do.
Isn't that funny?
I still do with all my heart.
Even when the girl doesn't get the guy in the end.
translation.ko: 여자가 끝까지 남자를 못 차지했는데도 말이지

translation.en: Or, in my case, both guys.
-That's amazing. Congratulations. -Thanks.
You go find your happy ending, Stacy Holt.
translation.ko: 꼭 네 해피엔딩을 찾아 스테이시 홀트

translation.en: And thanks for the continuing patronage.
By fall, I was ready to try again.
translation.ko: 가을쯤 되자 다시 도전할 준비가 됐다

translation.en: A little bruised. A little humbled.
And, hopefully, a little smarter.
I believe we write our own stories.
And each time we think we know the end...
...we don't.
Perhaps luck exists somewhere between...
...the world of planning, the world of chance...
translation.ko: 모든 걸 다 알 순 없다는 걸

translation.en: ...and in the peace that comes from knowing...
...that you just can't know it all.
translation.ko: 그 사이 어디쯤에 있는 것 같다

translation.en: You know, life's funny that way.
Once you let go of the wheel, you might end up...
...right where you belong.
Wow, that is such an amazing story.
I mean, you went through all of that, and here you are.
translation.ko: 그 모든 걸 겪고 여기까지 온 거잖아요

translation.en: I can do this job, Jane.
I've been preparing my whole life.
It's too bad Diane's gone.
She is?
On assignment. She'll be back next week.
translation.ko: 취재 가셨어요 다음 주에 오실 거예요

translation.en: But before she left...
...she told me, "If you find someone great for this job...
...I mean, perfect...
...don't let them go."
Welcome aboard, Stacy.
You mean...
-...I got the job? -You got the job.
Congratulations.
Stay here. I'll go check Diane's calendar.
translation.ko: 잠깐 있어요 다이앤 스케줄 보고 올게요

translation.en: Thank you.
-Hello, Mama? I got the job. -You got the job?
-You got the job! She got the job! -I got the job! I got the job!
-She got the job! -It's amazing, amazing, amazing.
-I knew it. -What could be better than this?
Mama, what could be better?
Are you Jane?
I'm Carly Simon. I'm here for the pre-tape.
translation.ko: 칼리 사이먼이에요 사전 녹음 때문에 왔는데

translation.en: Jane, Jane, Jane.
-Are you okay? Are you okay? -Hello? Stacy?
Honey? Honey, are you there?
Hello? Hi, I've just come into the studio, and I think your friend fainted.
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 전 방금 왔는데 당신 친구가 기절한 것 같아요

translation.en: She fainted? Oh, my God. Who is this?
My name is Carly Simon. I'm just here to meet with Jane.
translation.ko: 전 칼리 사이먼이에요 제인을 만나러 왔는데요

translation.en: Oh, I think she's coming around again, so I'll give her the phone.
Hello? Mama?
Gone. Are you really Carly Simon?
-Yeah, I just-- -I can't believe this.
-You just really made my life. -Are you Jane?
-My name is Stacy Holt. -Stacy.
I just got a job here. Please don't tell Diane that I fainted.
translation.ko: 방금 여기 취직했거든요 저 기절한 거 비밀이에요

translation.en: -You really are Carly Simon. -You're okay?
This is the most-- Yes, thank you. I'm so mortified.
I hug people when I'm embarrassed.
So do I. I do exactly the same thing.
translation.ko: 나도 그래요 나도 당황하면 포옹을 해요

translation.en: I think this is just about the greatest day of my life.
So thank you. Thank you so much.
I love you.
